Text: Aircraft porn??!! Had heard about people thats flies in real time with internet based controll towers(and force there relatives witness the whole ordeal in the  "passagengers" coach). But aircraft porn?

FTW2000, what gave you any idea that this is an aircraft porn?? This is an aircraft cockpit video with Lufthansa's McDonnell Douglas DC-10 aircraft,recorded on a Frankfurt-Beijing (Peking) flight.  Please follow this link to see what is it all about http://www.limox-media.de/dvds.htm?

Have you more air-planes movies? Thank you
for this.
